## 🎯 Overview

Welcome to the **Duel Commander Metagame Dashboard** — a community-driven project tracking deck performance and metagame trends.

You can explore:

- The **[Interactive Shiny App](https://your-shinyapps-url.shinyapps.io/metagame/)** (live winrates, matchup tables)
- The **[Data Generation Tool](tools/index.html)** to help tournament organizers format submissions

---

## 🔍 What’s Inside

- Automated data fetching from Google Sheets
- Dynamic tier computation and metagame visualizations
- Python helpers to clean tournament CSVs
